subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rich Lynch of Queens was one of the best young tennis players on the East Coast in the early 1980s. Years after his tennis career was over, on Sept. 11, 2001, Lynch found himself on the 84th floor of the World Trade Center’s south tower.
